data.text: @LouiseMartinCBC So is the provinces new policy let's let everyone get covid?
@LouiseMartinCBC Are the tests still being sent to the microbiology lab a new variant might explain why the island is having explosive exponential growth while other areas are declining just saying
@LouiseMartinCBC and our healthcare system can't handle this.

@LouiseMartinCBC I really hope you grill her @LouiseMartinCBC. Islanders are NOT happy with how Covid is being willed away by Dr. M/Dennis King and now they refuse to speak on it. This is NOT okay! This will cause thousands of Islanders to develop long-term disabilities

@LouiseMartinCBC @jbgreenan @stewerogers @MoriartyLab @COVID_19_Canada I would sure appreciate her take, on our measures being rapidly reduced, as our own numbers, and those of other jurisdictions rise.
